text:
Adobe | Senior Full-Stack Software Engineer | San Francisco or San Jose | 10+ years exp. |Full-time

We are building the next big thing in Adobe Document cloud using the latest web technologies. Ideal candidate has broad experience across the tech stack and can contribute wherever the challenges are. The team is pretty front end and javascript focused, but also contributes to backends in node/java/python.

https://adobe.wd5.myworkdayjobs.com/external_experienced/job...
